attributes.action: Provide free school meals for ALL school children in England by autumn 2022
attributes.background: Families are facing a rising cost of living crisis, and providing a nutritious meal to all school students should reduce the impact of this. A nutritious meal could also help improve concentration and learning alongside a reduction in the social impact of children on free meals being bullied.
